code: import sanityClient from"@sanity/client";import imageBuilder from"@sanity/image-url";export var client=sanityClient({projectId:process.env.REACT_APP_SANITY_PROJECT_ID,dataset:"production",apiVersion:"2022-05-25",useCdn:true,token:process.env.REACT_APP_SANITY_TOKEN});var builder=imageBuilder(client);export var urlFor=function urlFor(source){return builder.image(source);};
